com.mygdx.pixelworld.data.draw

Class DrawData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.pixelworld.data.draw.DrawData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimationDrawData, StaticDrawData

    public abstract class DrawData
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Class used to generify every sprite drawing process. It takes care of drawing sprites with the correct scale factor and rotation angle, and automatically takes care of map offset and bounding shapes.
